subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*r-la(w)ŋ||steam; hot (liquid)}}; compare {{cog|bo|རླངས||steam, vapour; steamy}} ({{zh-ref|Bodman, 1980}}; STEDT).

Related to {{och-l|盪|basin for holding hot water for washing; wash basin}}, {{och-l|煬|to heat; to roast}} ({{zh-ref|Wang, 1982}}; {{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
